sample.MainView

type
class
extends
primevc.mvc.core.MVCCore<MainFacade>
implements
primevc.mvc.core.IView
MainView corresponds to the view of the MVC model. It defines, groups together and couples mediators and UI elements. This separates event handling from UI and allows different UI elements to have their own event handlers.
